meanings.definition: Inflammation of the lining of the stomach.
meanings.sent1: Gastritis can cause stomach pain and discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with gastritis after she complained of stomach pain.
meanings.sent3: When gastritis strikes, it feels like a tiny fire burning in your stomach.
meanings.sent4: Her gastritis was a storm raging within her stomach, causing turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The gastritis was like an unwelcome guest overstaying its welcome in her stomach.

meanings.definition: An acute or chronic condition characterized by inflammation of the stomach lining.
meanings.sent1: Severe gastritis can lead to ulcers in the stomach lining.
meanings.sent2: His gastritis was so severe that he had to undergo treatment regularly.
meanings.sent3: The gastritis in his stomach seemed to have a mind of its own, causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The gastritis was a relentless enemy attacking his stomach lining.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain from gastritis felt like tiny knives stabbing his stomach lining.

meanings.sent1: Many people experience gastritis after eating spicy foods.
meanings.sent2: Gastritis can be managed with dietary changes and medication.
meanings.sent3: His gastritis acted up whenever he indulged in greasy foods.
meanings.sent4: The gastritis was a reminder to take care of his digestive system.
meanings.sent5: The discomfort from gastritis made him rethink his eating habits.
